verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> thou unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>obeyeth<s%> not the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,

Which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, according to all which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: so shall ye be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>:

That I may <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> I, and <S%H559>said<s%>, So be <S%H543>it<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

For I <S%H5749>earnestly<s%> <S%H5749>protested<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5749>protesting<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

Yet they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not, nor <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%>, but <S%H3212>walked<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>: therefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon them all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them to <S%H6213>do<s%>; but they <S%H6213>did<s%> them not.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, A <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

They are turned <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H7223%H1>forefathers<s%>, which <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>; and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon them, which they shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3318>escape<s%>; and though they shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto me, I will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto them.

Then shall the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%>, and <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> unto whom they offer <S%H6999>incense<s%>: but they shall not <S%H3467>save<s%> them at <S%H3467>all<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

For according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> were thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have ye set <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to that shameful <S%H1322>thing<s%>, even <S%H4196>altars<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> not thou for this <S%H5971>people<s%>, neither lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7440>cry<s%> or <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for them: for I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that they <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto me for their <S%H7451>trouble<s%>.

What hath my <S%H3039>beloved<s%> to do in mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, seeing she hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H4209>lewdness<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%>, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H5674>passed<s%> from thee? when thou doest <S%H7451>evil<s%>, then thou <S%H5937>rejoicest<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, A <S%H7488>green<s%> olive <S%H2132>tree<s%>, <S%H3303>fair<s%>, and of <S%H8389>goodly<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: with the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1999>tumult<s%> he hath <S%H3341>kindled<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> upon it, and the <S%H1808>branches<s%> of it are <S%H7489>broken<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that <S%H5193>planted<s%> thee, hath <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against thee, <S%H1558>for<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> against themselves to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> in offering <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath given me <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of it, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: then thou <S%H7200>shewedst<s%> me their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

But I was like a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> or an <S%H441>ox<s%> that is <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter<s%>; and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that they had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> against me, saying, Let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> with the <S%H3899>fruit<s%> thereof, and let us cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>, that his <S%H8034>name<s%> may be no more <S%H2142>remembered<s%>.

But, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that <S%H8199>judgest<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%>, that <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, let me <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them: for unto thee have I <S%H1540>revealed<s%> my <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> not in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that thou <S%H4191>die<s%> not by our <S%H3027>hand<s%>:

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them: the young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by <S%H7458>famine<s%>:

And there shall be no <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of them: for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>, even the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%>.
